title: John Stamos
description:
John Stamos (The Grand Scheme: Snatching Sinatra podcast, Big Shot) talks to Justin about getting sober, they discuss the notion of staying friends with your exes, and John tells Justin about how he got involved with performing with The Beach Boys. 


Justin and Christian have a fun phone call with friend of the show, Jerry O’Connell. 


 The Grand Scheme: Snatching Sinatra is available now, wherever you listen to podcasts: wondery.fm/Sinatra_LifeisShort.
